001package net.tvburger.jdl.plots;
002
003import org.knowm.xchart.HeatMapChart;
004import org.knowm.xchart.SwingWrapper;
005import org.knowm.xchart.XYChart;
006import org.knowm.xchart.XYChartBuilder;
007
008public class HeatMap {
009
010    private final HeatMapChart chart;
011    private SwingWrapper<XYChart> wrapper;
012
013    public HeatMap(String title) {
014        this.chart = null;//createChart(title);
015    }
016
017    private static XYChart createChart(String title) {
018        return new XYChartBuilder()
019                .width(600).height(300)
020                .title(title)
021                .xAxisTitle("x")
022                .yAxisTitle("y")
023                .build();
024    }
025
026    public void drawMap(double[][] map) {
027    }
028}
